title: Apsara Diamond Haaram with Emerald Accents and Pearl Drops
materials: South Sea Pearls. Finished with a signature Hyderabadi Polish.
features: This stunning two-layer Haaram features intricate floral motifs set with dazzling brilliant-cut diamonds. Each flower is meticulously crafted to capture the light, creating a breathtaking sparkle. The pendant showcases a larger floral design, accentuated by a vibrant Zambian Emerald at its center. Delicate South Sea pearls dangle gracefully from each layer, adding a touch of timeless elegance. The 'Apsara' design embodies traditional Telugu jewelry aesthetics with a contemporary flair, featuring a layered design and delicate detailing.
occasions: Festive Occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
description: This Haaram is a perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality diamonds and emeralds ensures exceptional brilliance and lasting value. The Hyderabadi polish gives the gold a rich, lustrous finish. It's a statement piece that will be treasured for generations, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune.
